reviewText: dvd format will not play in my player!
Had to return it. Doesn't work with standard equiptment

I love good documentary films for science and nature. This "Rise of Animals" is one of the best. The past 550 million years is the most important in the evolution history of animals. This film is very informative in the evolution of vertebrates and mammals.

I think I have all of David's DVDs.  If I see something I don't have, I buy it immediately.  One of my favorites at the top of the list is "Lost Worlds, Vanished Lives"  So, when I put this second on my list, I am saying that this is one of the best most interesting projects David has done yet.  I LOVE this.  David always informs and not just entertains.  Now, his team includes the best of CGI and the perfect mix of graphic aids as you would expect.  In this video it is apparent that the Chinese also love David's shows and had opened their doors to David and his cameramen.  So, we are treated to a rare tour of China and their discoveries [and there are many] and I am sure you will be impressed too.  Buy this one, you won't regret it.
Excellent product which was brand new and protected in shrink wrap. Thank You.
I got it from uk itune store, it is just excellent! I wish we can have it from Amazon instant video, or us itune store, because it took forever to download from the uk site
Sure wish I had been informed that this was regional  and wasn't going to play on my American Blu Ray player before I spent like fourth bucks on it. That being said this is another excellent doc.
